ingredients.ingredient: 5 pounds beef brisket, trimmed of fat
2 tablespoons brisket rub (such as Fiesta®), or as needed

cookingTips: Apply mustard as a binder for the rub to help it adhere during smoking
Maintain smoker temperature at 225-250°F and smoke until internal temperature reaches 203°F
Wrap brisket in butcher paper during the last stages to prevent over-smoking and retain moisture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What wood chips would you use for smoking—hickory, oak, or mesquite—and how would each affect the final flavor?
